external_games.name: New Gundam Breaker Special Mission: Her Name is Super Fumina

name: New Gundam Breaker: Special Mission - Her Name is Super Fumina
summary: The day-one special mission "Her Name is Super Fumina" is the only mission where you'll find the titular Super Fumina! Complete it to receive a special Fumina Ticket that can be exchanged for any part you like!
